query:
SELECT 
  'Journeys' as tableName,
  COUNT(*) as totalRecords,
  SUM(CASE WHEN isPublished = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as published,
  COUNT(DISTINCT id) as unique_count
FROM journeys
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Journey Days',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN content IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(DISTINCT journeyId)
FROM journeyDays
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Conversations',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN mode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(DISTINCT userId)
FROM conversations
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Conversation Messages',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN role = 'assistant' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(DISTINCT conversationId)
FROM conversationMessages
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Embeddings',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN embedding IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(DISTINCT contentType)
FROM embeddings
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Users',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN role = 'admin' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(*)
FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Journal Entries',
  COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN content IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  COUNT(DISTINCT userId)
FROM journalEntries;
